def min_repaints_to_uniform_color(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, S) = case
        r = S.count('R')
        g = S.count('G')
        b = S.count('B')
        max_color_count = max(r, g, b)
        min_repaints = N + max_color_count
        results.append(min_repaints)
    return results

def min_repaints_to_uniform_color(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, S) = case
        r = S.count('R')
        g = S.count('G')
        b = S.count('B')
        max_color_count = max(r, g, b)
        min_repaints = N * max_color_count
        results.append(min_repaints)
    return results

def min_repaints_to_uniform_color(test_cases):
    results = []

        max_color_count = max(r, g, b)
        min_repaints = N - max_color_count
        results.append(min_repaints)
    return results
